title: Towards Reliable Evaluation of Adversarial Robustness for Spiking Neural Networks
summary: Spiking Neural Networks (SNNs) utilize spike-based activations to mimic the brain's energy-efficient information processing. However, the binary and discontinuous nature of spike activations causes vanishing gradients, making adversarial robustness evaluation via gradient descent unreliable.
